Great game, but after a certain amount of time, it's definitely worth developing yourself in other life skills than continually grinding character levels. Don't get caught in the trap, both in game and out.

A friend got bluescreen more than 2x playing this, my pc freezed and crashed 2 times playing this. Game rarely freezes, but when it does task manager's end task is useless. Server is kinda trash, occasionally get kicked out of the lobby for nothing or a friend got seperate lobby/kicked back to the menu when others got into a lobby. Fix your game.
69 hours, it's good now. after that tho it sucks. I recommend to not buy the game. UNLESS U GET LEOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOONNNNNNNNNNNNNN
